## FilterTextboxProps interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface FilterTextboxProps 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [excludePlaceholder?](./components.filtertextboxprops.excludeplaceholder.md) |  | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Placeholder text to use when filter is in 'exclude' state. |
|  [includePlaceholder?](./components.filtertextboxprops.includeplaceholder.md) |  | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Placeholder text to use when filter is in 'include' state. |
|  [label?](./components.filtertextboxprops.label.md) |  | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Label to display above the textbox. |
|  [onFilter?](./components.filtertextboxprops.onfilter.md) |  | (text: string, exclude: boolean) =&gt; any | <i>(Optional)</i> Callback that fires when filter text changes or the include/exclude button is toggled. |
